storyInfo:
The summer harvest approaches, but He Sheng's project does not go well. A bit of advice from Shu gets his hopes back up.
On this quiet summer night, a few youths sit together on the ridges in the fields and share their thoughts.

attributes.content: This is a report on the Shanhaizhong and Catastrophe countermeasures... and review of my own actions.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm sorry I let you down, Father...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Now, I willâ€”
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: You won't have to participate in Yumen's return to the capital anymore.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Are you giving me a suspension?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's not my place to interfere with the Sui Regulator's appointments, but as the warden of Yumen, I have authority over military personnel assignments.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: There's an important mission for you to undertake, away from Yumen.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: It's planting season in Dahuang, in the north, and they're short-handed. Go and help them.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Planting season? You mean, agriculture?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: That's the 'important mission'?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Is that not important?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I understand that agriculture is the lifeblood of the nation, and I've heard about Dahuang, but...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I don't understand. Why me?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: So you might see.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: And after I see...?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You think.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Be ready to depart, once you've completed the mission handover.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: One last thing, Father.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I discovered some suspicious activity when investigating the Shanhaizhong's movements.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: They appeared to be very familiar with Yumen patrol schedules and routes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: If they really managed to obtain intelligence on Yumen's defensesâ€”
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I have spoken.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: This is not your concern anymore.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Never forget what all you do is for.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: A man like you can't be trusted!
attributes.name: Jieyun

attributes.content: *pant*... *pant*...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Working in the fields by day and practicing kung fu by night for a whole month. You must be exhausted.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: *pant* Yun... it's you.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You were focused.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: But I didn't achieve anything...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...I don't even know what I'm doing here.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Perhaps, by focusing on improving myself here, I'll be able to do what I couldn't before.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Well... perhaps.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: You know, there's this old Lungmen kung fu movie...
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: The hero was an arrogant and haughty swordsman who spent all his life pursuing martial perfection, which always seemed just out of reach.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: His fortunes took an ill turn and he lost everything: fame, fortune, reputation, even one of his arms. Now a broken man, he found himself in a tiny, remote village.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: There, he lived amongst the peasants, eating with the lowly folk who used to lie beneath his notice. For three years, he chopped his own firewood and boiled his own water, not touching his sword even once.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: He finally drew his blade when his enemies came for him. To his surprise, his sword struck with a fury he had never known before.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Are... are you saying that I'm arrogant and haughty?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm just telling you what happened in the movie.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Do things like that happen in reality?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: To my knowledge? Of course not. The audiences love it, though. Back to basics, the proud humbled, that sort of thing.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: However, it is true that one's temperament has an effect on many things.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Have you felt your perspective change since you left Yumen?
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: I don't feel like it has at all...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: How about a break? Water?
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Thanks. I have a question myself...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Why did you come with me? Why not stay in Yumen?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You're traveling across Yan as Candleholder. I felt like I could learn a lot by accompanying you on your journeys.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: I was demotâ€”sent here by father. You could have learned just as much by going back to the capital with Yumen.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I went with Laoshi to Baizao. It was prosperous, but little else.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Dahuang seemed more interesting.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: You're talking like you're on holiday.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: I don't understand what Father wants me to see...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What have you seen, then, during your time in Dahuang?
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: What have I seen...?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Dahuang used to be one of the rare places without much Originium pollution, due to its unique geography, making it an important Yanese breadbasket since antiquity.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But thanks to the hard work of the Agricultural Tianshis, arable land area is growing year after year.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Construction has begun on defenses against potential Catastrophes.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Currently, the city has sixteen large plates, some sixty or so small plates, seven hundred and thirty Tianshis, and a population exceeding fifty thousand.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Despite its remote location, the people are content and hardworking...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Is that all?
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Just some insignificant details.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Insignificant, eh?
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: What about you? Did you find any sights that you couldn't have seen with the Grandmaster?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Well... for example...
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: The couple next door had a big fight after dinner last night.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: The husband had gone on a journey last month and found the other cities to be much more interesting. He wanted to move away.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: I saw the pair of fowlbeasts that make their nest in that tree outside taking turns to hunt and sit on their eggs. The eggs should hatch any day now.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: I also saw the strange sight that was Tianshis of all vocations coming together to fret, even cry their hearts out before Shennong's statue...
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: The strangest scene I saw, however, was that of a few animals making a fool of a young kung fu master.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Did you find the stockbeast?
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: When did you...?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Many years ago, the Grandmaster instructed me in the moves of all the various schools of kung fu and had me record the clashes with experts from those myriad schools. But my innate condition prevents me from studying the martial arts.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: I said you must be exhausted, working in the fields by day and practicing kung fu by night. I envy you, as a matter of fact.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Even so, the Grandmaster allowed me to follow him, allowed someone who could not study kung fu to watch you do so.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: He didn't tell me what I was supposed to learn, only that I should pay attention to detail and accuracy. I recorded and studied according to his instructions.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Then I began to realize that kung fu isn't just about moves. The Grandmaster's philosophies on the fist are also philosophies on life, and every action or lack thereof corresponds to the natural laws of wax and wane.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: This wisdom amazed me even further, focusing on the infinite mysteries of kung fu. Where do you even start?
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: The Sui Regulator's kung fu is not just for self-defense, but also to suppress the enemy and protect the innocent.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I don't think one should draw too many conclusions about it. It's just a skill.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Right. I later realized that it wasn't so complicated. Kung fu is just kung fu, no more, no less.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: I didn't learn this through study of the martial arts. I learned this wisdom from everyday life as I grew older and wiser, correlating it with kung fu.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Wisdom isn't about one thing. It's about everything.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Everything.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Grandmaster wrote in the Book of Arms, 'See the other through the self; remain upright and wait for the proper time.'
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: What he means is that one must ensure that one's posture is upright and firm, then seek the opportunity for victory.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: No matter the situation, one must remain composed, unaffected by outside matters...
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Eek!
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: What's that? You look like you saw a ghost.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: There you are, Candlestick! So you were with Inkbrush. I was looking for you all day!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Rice Experiment Area A: Soil Originium activity was twenty percent during the growing period. Total production was approximately three hundred and twenty catties.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Experiment Area B: Twenty-three percent Originium activity, one hundred and fifty catties' production; Experiment Area C: Twenty-five percent Originium activity, almost zero crop survival...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Negligible change from last season's data, or the season before. The same goes for the other crop experiment areas.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: You don't look disappointed at all.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: No point trying to rush things. We take them one step at a time.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Twenty-five percent remains the critical line. Plant survivability drops off precipitously once soil Originium activity exceeds that level. This applies to both cash crops and cover crops.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Yet the figure remains much lower than the level of natural soil Originium activity in the vast majority of regions...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Thinking about giving up?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I'm just not sure... if this is the only result, then there is no way to expand the application of the Wanqing 'the Ten Thousand Qing of Fertile Fields' project.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: All these years, and nothing to show for it... not even a bud of hope.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Fifteen percent.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Twenty-five years ago, that was the critical line that had us stumped.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: It took nine generations of crops before we found an Originium-resistant variant in the corner of one of the plates.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: You and the Tianshis kept going for this long?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Did you know that people used to fertilize the fields with fluids from the Dahuang Fibrous Slug in order to protect crops from the impact of Originium?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Yes, but it's just folklore. There's no scientific basis to it. Originium doesn't infect plants like it does animals, it only changes the...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Yes, but that's what people in the past came up with when technology wasn't so advanced, the result of coincidence and misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: We tried so many different things, just to carve out a little piece of farmland for ourselves. It took generations after generations of trial and error to get agriculture to where it is today.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: As you said, the Wanqing project is one where hope is hard to come by.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Perhaps, many years later, people will look back at us the same way as we look back at the ancients who fertilized their fields with Fibrous Slug fluids.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Only one thing is clear, though. Plates on their own can't produce enough food for everyone. People will always go hungry in the remote villages, places where the nomadic city can't reach.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: And I'm willing to believe that, one day, we'll break the shackles of Originium, and then we'll truly have The Ten Thousand Qing of Fertile Fields... a certain someone said that to me, once upon a time.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Do you mean...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Still working in the lab at this hour? The power bills keep piling up.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: I-I'm just here to submit some data. I'll be going now!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Oh, Xiaohe. Haven't seen you for a while. Look how tall you've grown! Why don't you stay for dinner?
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Er, sorry, I, er, have things to do in the fields. Excuse me.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Why does he always look like he's terrified of me?
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: You're the big boss of Dahuang. People should be scared of you.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Doesn't mean everyone will listen to me. Isn't the hour a little late to still be working?
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Alright, alright, I'll be going.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Cooking soup so late is rather tiring.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang
Old Xiangzhang
attributes.content: Mm, smells good.

attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang
attributes.content: Who are you treating? Your sisters? Or that 'relative' of yours who came to visit? What's his name, Zuo Le?
Everyone's working hard in preparation for the summer harvest. This soup is for the hardest worker.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Did you have to poke fun at me before dinner? A little mean, don't you think?
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Then bring the bowl over.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: All my life I've been dealing with things that grow from the soil. Now I have to learn everything about engineering from scratch.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: And it's not easy, dealing with the Ministry of Engineering, arguing all day about the assignment of a few Tianshis. It's even more tiring than farmwork.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Eat up, then. You've definitely lost a few catties.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Sure. Except...
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Three huge pieces of rib in one bowl? You're trying to burst my stomach.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Three's plenty. One more and it's going to spill over.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Spilled soup would make a mess, and it's even worse when someone gets burned.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: You can put it down if you don't want it.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: That won't do. So much effort went into this soup, we can't let it go to waste.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Do you have to talk like that today?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I'm just talking about this bowl of ribs and lian'ou soup.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: The ribs come from lovingly raised meatbeasts, while the lian'ou comes from ponds that we dug with our own hands.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: This soup represents the efforts of generations of people, and of your efforts all these years. We must not allow what should not be here to ruin this hard-won soil.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: After all these years, you...
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: So many years. I've almost forgotten how I came to know you.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Sometimes I wish I really did. If only you were just a diligent Nongye Tianshi, and me a humble farmer.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: But I could never forget. Even if I forgot, someone would help me remember. The scrolls of the Sui Regulator remember. The list of fallen Candleholders remembers.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Say no more.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: You know what I mean. What I'm concerned about. Your... 'brother'.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: One person can fool another, but no one can fool time. It took me the better part of my lifetime to come to trust you. I don't have the time left to trust another.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: He shouldn't have come back at a time like this, Shu.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Don't make things difficult for me.
attributes.name: Old Xiangzhang

attributes.content: Good evening, Grain Buds.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Inkbrush... why are you standing so far away?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Alright, I promise, I know your book isn't a sketchbook and I won't add faces to the people in it.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: (Sketchbook? Does she mean your Record of Martial Combat?)
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: (My fault.)
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: (Don't ever let the Grandmaster or Qiubai see it.)
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: (I know...)
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: (Although, come to think of it, they might like the cartoonish style...)
attributes.name: Record Keeper
Zuo Le
attributes.content: Ahem...

attributes.name: Zuo Le
attributes.content: Were you looking for me, Grain Buds?
Here, this is for you.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: A bracelet?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Weaved from Mianmian's wool. Thank-you gift for bringing him home today.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I didn't do anything... except cause problems.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Well, don't think too much about what Xiaohe said. He's alright most of the time, but he gets all angry and stubborn when it comes to farming. All the young Tianshis he tutors are scared of him.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: He's already a Shouye Tianshi?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I think? He takes over Shu's lessons when she's busy. There are so many kinds of Tianshi, I just can't keep track of them.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Say, why are you called Candlestick, anyway?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Candleholder?
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Yeah! It's so weird. Nobody uses candles anymore.
attributes.name: Grain Buds
Zuo Le
attributes.content: The title 'Candleholder' comes from...

attributes.name: Zuo Le
attributes.content: Never mind. It means that I'm one of Yan's official Messengers.
Well, mind that you don't accidentally set the letters on fire.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Pfft.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: What are you snickering at, sketchbook Inkbrush?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Nothing, Candlestick messenger.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: The sky grows dark. The summer breeze brings the fresh scent of the earth.
Insects sing amongst the grass as the stars rise.
There is a figure wandering not far away, and Grain Buds picks it up right away.
Xiaohe! When are you gonna come over?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Are you still angry that I asked you to help get the Tianshis to register the foals?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I'm not angry.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I'm just exhausted after dealing with the foals he brought back.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Oh... do you need to go to bed?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: And we need to name the pair. They were found together... I've got an idea! Let's name them Xiaoman like 'Grain Buds' and Xiaohe like 'Grain Stalk'!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: No way.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: He Sheng sits down on the grass.
Sorry. If you're still angry at me.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm not really angry at you...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Candlestick! What is a Messenger like you doing in Dahuang? You're not delivering letters, just playing with us all day.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I made a mistake. Father sent me here to learn.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: But I'm still not sure what I'm supposed to learn, or how I'm supposed to learn it.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: In my old job, there were a lot of things that hadn't been cleared up, but Father wouldn't let me investigate. I'm not even sure what I'm doing here...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Wow, your dad's scary.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: When the teachers at the Tianshi Bureau scold the kids even younger than me, they say that if you don't behave, your baba and mama will come and punish you.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Well, Candlestick got punished by his baba. But I've made so many mistakes, so why don't my baba and mama come and punish me?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Your parents...?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Shu says my parents are Tianshis in a place far away. But she never told me what they do, or why I don't hear from them.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: The Xiangzhang says my parents named me Xiaoman, or Grain Buds, because they think we should be content with the little things, like grains in the field.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: General Zuo must be hoping that you'll live a happy and carefree life, Zuo Le.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: The Grandmaster must hope that you will be content and comfortable in whatever situation then, Yun.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Come to think of it, I never got the chance to ask you your name.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Yun Qingping. People sometimes say it sounds like a girl's name.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Not at all. It's nice.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Reminds me of lotus ponds in summer.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Xiaohe's name has a story behind it too! The farmers found him in the rice fields. The old folks thought he was born from the rice crops, which is how he got a name that means rice stalk.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Shu still has a picture from back then! I'll bring it tomorrow.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Grain Buds!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Everyone loves that photo. Candlestick and Inkbrush should see it too!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: (Why doesn't He Sheng get a nickname beyond Xiaohe?)
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: (Why not contribute one? Grain Buds here seems quite amendable to suggestions.)
attributes.name: Yun Qingping

attributes.content: The summer evening breeze brushes their hair, to the accompaniment of cicada songs.
A few fireflies take to the air, while stars fall from the sky.
Grain Buds is no longer chasing the fireflies. She sits on the grass smelling of night dew, panting from the chase.
There is no room for gloom or worry in the heart of the young and innocent. She only has eyes for the sincere joy of the present.
Look! Shooting stars!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: According to Shu, the old Shennong stories say that crops grow well where the shooting star falls.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Should we go and see where they fell?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: She said that to get you to come down from your tree and go to bed. You seriously think it's true?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Of course I do!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: But it's very far away, way beyond Dahuang.
attributes.name: Yun Qingping

attributes.content: Then we'll leave Dahuang.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: What if they fell at the edge of Heaven?
attributes.name: Yun Qingping

attributes.content: Then we'll go to the edge of Heaven! I'll go. You'll come too, Xiaohe, and the rest of you, too.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: There's a lot of time to look for them before the sun rises.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Maybe we'll never find them, and keep walking until we're all grandpas and grandmas.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Searching for stars?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hah, yes, searching for stars.
attributes.name: Yun Qingping

attributes.content: Has it occurred to you that this may be what you're supposed to be looking for?
attributes.name: Yun Qingping

attributes.content: Stars?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Come, let's cross this stream!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Hey, Zuo Le.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: How old are you?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Nineteen.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Nothing... I'm older than you.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Wei, what are you talking about over there?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Tomorrow is the Xiazhi. Dahuang will be holding the Shennong Festival, welcoming Shennong with songs and costumes. Let's go have some fun!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Didn't you say you wanted to look for the stars?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I said, until the sun rises.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: The Shennong Festival? That's not for fun, is it?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Of course it is! They put on plays and fairs, and there's lots to eat! The Xiangzhang says everybody has been working so hard, we should relax a little.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Xiaohe's going. I'm gonna play the flute... there are other shows too!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Alright, I'll go and see.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'll see... and think.
attributes.name: Zuo Le
